title: USA Cycling announces 2023 UCI Road World Championships teams
content:
32 athletes, including Neilson Powless, Quinn Simmons, and Chloe Dygert have been selected to compete at the 2023 UCI Cycling World Championships in Glasgow, Scotland Aug 5-12.

Read the full article at USA Cycling announces 2023 UCI Road World Championships teams on Velo.
author: Betsy Welch
